mapper.insert: insert into member (login_id, login_password, email, nickname, email_key) values (#{loginId}, #{loginPassword}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{emailKey})
mapper.update: update member set email_auth=1 where email=#{email} and email_key=#{emailKey}
update member set email_Key=#{newMailKey} where email=#{member.email} and email_key=#{member.emailKey}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where login_id = #{loginId} and email_auth=1
